value_claims.claim_title: 66% higher return on ad spend from AI-optimized creative
value_claims.claim_description: Ads that achieved a Creative Quality Score above 66% (meeting AI-generated creative requirements) generated 66% higher return on ad spend compared to ads below this threshold.
value_claims.source_quote: Ads that had a creative quality score of above 66% had a 66% higher ROAS.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: AI platform analyzed historical campaigns to create creative rules and scoring system that directly determined which ads met requirements, with measured ROAS improvement tied to AI-generated score.

value_claims.claim_title: AI-driven creative rules deployed across 15,000 marketers
value_claims.claim_description: Nestlé implemented AI-generated creative guidelines across its entire marketing organization of 15,000 marketers working on 2,000 brands in 200 territories, requiring all creative assets to be validated through the system.
value_claims.source_quote: Now, Nestlé's 15,000 marketers – who work across 2,000 brands in 200 territories – as well as its agency partners are required to run all creative assets through the system to check they meet the new requirements before they can run.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: AI platform (CreativeX) analyzes and scores all creative assets, with mandatory compliance required before ads can run, directly governing creative production workflow.

value_claims.claim_title: Elimination of wasted time on creative platform optimization
value_claims.claim_description: AI-generated creative rules eliminated time previously wasted on endless discussions about technical creative details like logo placement, allowing teams to focus on creative ideas and execution instead.
value_claims.source_quote: Prior to the CreativeX integration, Gandon says her teams were 'wasting time having endless discussions' about whether the logo placement in an ad had made it underperform when she would rather be discussing the idea or the execution.
value_claims.quote_location: Near end of article, discussing impact on creative process
value_claims.attribution_evidence: AI platform provides automated validation of technical creative requirements, removing need for manual discussions and debates about platform-specific optimization rules.

value_claims.claim_title: AI analysis of thousands of historical campaigns to derive creative rules
value_claims.claim_description: CreativeX AI platform analyzed thousands of Nestlé's historical campaigns to identify creative elements that drove better results, establishing data-driven rules for successful campaigns across different platforms.
value_claims.source_quote: Gandon sought the help of CreativeX, a company that builds creative data platforms for brands, and plugged thousands of historical campaigns into its AI, analyzing the ads to find the elements that drove better results.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: AI performed the analysis of historical campaign data to extract patterns and rules, a task requiring processing scale and pattern recognition beyond manual capability.

value_claims.claim_title: Automated creative quality scoring for platform suitability
value_claims.claim_description: AI system automatically generates Creative Quality Score for each asset, ranking suitability to different platforms (Meta, YouTube) and providing automated reports on compliance with Nestlé's creative guidelines.
value_claims.source_quote: Now, any new asset it creates can automatically be checked and we can spit out a report that says what was done right and what was done wrong in line with Nestlé's guidelines.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: AI platform performs automated analysis and scoring of creative assets against learned rules, replacing manual review and roadshow processes for guideline enforcement.

value_claims.claim_title: Industry-first correlation of creative data to offline sales via MMM
value_claims.claim_description: Nestlé and CreativeX achieved an industry first by correlating creative quality data to offline sales through Marketing Mix Modelling study with Meta, moving beyond traditional engagement metrics.
value_claims.source_quote: The creative data was pulled into a Marketing Mix Modelling (MMM) study by Meta to generate a return on ad spend (ROAS) figures – according to Leng, an industry first.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: AI-generated creative quality scores provided the data input for MMM analysis, contributing to but not solely responsible for the correlation methodology innovation.
